embedding_locations.comment: word2vec pretrained on Wikipedia+Aquaint; download them embeddings from https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-yipfgecoSBb1dTcW5MdVhGNkE
word2vec embeddings pretrained on google news; download them from https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7XkCwpI5KDYNlNUTTlSS21pQmM/edit?usp=sharing

glove embeddings. download them from http://nlp.stanford.edu/data/glove.42B.300d.zip then convert to w2v format as follows: python -m gensim.scripts.glove2word2vec --input glove.42B.300d.txt --output glove.42B.300d.txt.w2v
